Text.Page:
The ancient magic of the god Balder has long maintained the {@Rgn:30008$$Lower Archive}, but it seems like that magic is starting to fade.

The {@LinkCreature:30#190#brass stewards} in the temple are a good example. Their original role was to maintain the temple garden and ward off monsters.

Now, the stewards have become the monsters, hostile to all that lives.

For everyone's sake, the {@LinkCreature:30#190#brass stewards} must be eliminated.

I'm a little sad. The stewards were faithful guardians to Balder and his garden, yet we dismantle them without a second thought.

I know, I know. I asked you to do it. Nevertheless, I feel bad for the stewards.
